description: Build your online store from scratch with Shopify - complete setup in under 2 hours
affiliateDisclosure: This guide contains affiliate links. We earn a commission if you sign up through our links, at no extra cost to you. This helps us create more free guides!

prerequisites.title: What You'll Need
prerequisites.description: Make sure you have these ready before starting:
items: Credit card for Shopify subscription ($29-299/month after trial)
Domain name idea (optional - can use free .myshopify.com)

steps.title: Sign Up for Shopify
steps.description: Start your 3-day free trial - no credit card required to begin
steps.instructions:
1. Click the button below to start your Shopify trial
2. Enter your email address
3. Click 'Start free trial'
4. Fill in: Store name, Country, Industry
5. Click 'Next' to continue

üí° Pro Tip: Choose your store name carefully - it will be your default URL (storename.myshopify.com)
tips: 3-day free trial, then $1/month for first 3 months
No credit card needed to start trial
Store name becomes your subdomain (changeable later)

spotlight.message: Look for the 'Start free trial' button and enter your email

steps.title: Complete Store Setup Survey
steps.description: Shopify asks a few questions to customize your experience
steps.instructions:
1. Answer 'Are you already selling?' (Yes/No)
2. Select your current revenue (if applicable)
3. Choose your industry from dropdown
4. Click 'Next'
5. Set up your store address

üìù Note: This helps Shopify show relevant features, but doesn't affect functionality
tips: Be honest - helps with relevant features
Store address needed for legal/tax purposes

spotlight.message: Answer the questions and click 'Next' to continue with store setup

steps.title: Add Your First Product
steps.description: Let's add a product to your store - you can edit or delete this later
steps.instructions:
1. In Shopify admin, click 'Products' in left sidebar
2. Click 'Add product' button
3. Fill in:
   - Title: Product name
   - Description: What it is, why buy it
   - Price: Your selling price
   - Upload at least 1 image
4. Scroll down and click 'Save'

üí° You can add more details later (variants, inventory, SEO)
tips: Can add unlimited products on all plans

spotlight.message: Click 'Add product' to create your first product listing

steps.title: Choose and Customize Your Theme
steps.description: Pick a professional design for your store - many free options available
steps.instructions:
1. Click 'Online Store' in left sidebar
2. Click 'Themes'
3. Browse free themes or explore paid ones
4. Click 'Add' on a theme you like
5. Once added, click 'Customize' to edit it
6. Customize: Logo, colors, fonts, homepage layout
7. Click 'Save' in top right when done

üé® Recommended free themes: Dawn, Sense, Craft
tips: Dawn is the newest, fastest free theme

steps.title: Set Up Payment Methods
steps.description: Enable customers to pay you - Shopify Payments is easiest
steps.instructions:
1. Go to Settings (bottom left)
2. Click 'Payments'
3. For Shopify Payments:
   - Click 'Complete account setup'
   - Fill in business details
   - Bank account for payouts
   - Verify identity (may need ID)
4. Alternatively, add PayPal, Stripe, or others
5. Click 'Save'

üí≥ Shopify Payments: 2.9% + 30¬¢ per transaction (no extra fees)
tips: Shopify Payments = lowest fees (no gateway fee)
Must use Shopify Payments for Shop Pay

spotlight.message: Complete your Shopify Payments setup to accept payments

steps.title: Configure Shipping Settings
steps.description: Set up how you'll ship products to customers
steps.instructions:
1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Shipping and delivery
2. Under Shipping, click 'Manage rates'
3. Add shipping zones (countries you ship to)
4. For each zone, add rates:
   - Free shipping (set minimum order)
   - Flat rate (single price)
   - Calculated (real-time carrier rates)
5. Set handling time (how long to ship)
6. Click 'Save'

üì¶ For digital products: Create a zone with $0 shipping
tips: Test checkout to verify rates work

steps.title: Set Up Tax Settings
steps.description: Configure automatic tax collection (required in most regions)
steps.instructions:
1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Taxes and duties
2. Your location is auto-detected
3. Enable 'Collect sales tax' for your region
4. For US: Shopify calculates state tax automatically
5. For EU: Enable VAT collection if applicable
6. Set tax-exempt products if needed
7. Click 'Save'

‚öñÔ∏è Note: You're responsible for remitting collected taxes
tips: EU: VAT required if selling to EU
Can set up tax overrides for specific products

steps.title: Add Essential Pages
steps.description: Create required legal pages and about/contact pages
steps.instructions:
1. Go to Online Store ‚Üí Pages
2. Click 'Add page'
3. Create these pages:
   - About Us (your story)
   - Contact (email/phone/form)
   - Shipping Policy (auto-generated)
   - Refund Policy (auto-generated)
   - Privacy Policy (auto-generated)
   - Terms of Service (auto-generated)
4. For legal pages: Use Shopify's policy generator
5. Customize each page content
6. Click 'Save' for each

‚öñÔ∏è Legal pages are required by law in most countries
tips: Contact page: Multiple ways to reach you
Add these pages to footer navigation
Review policies with lawyer if high-risk business

steps.title: Set Up Your Domain
steps.description: Connect your custom domain or buy one through Shopify
steps.instructions:
Option 1: Buy domain through Shopify
1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Domains
2. Click 'Buy new domain'
3. Search for available domain
4. Purchase (around $14/year)
5. Done! Auto-configured.

Option 2: Connect existing domain
1. Go to Settings ‚Üí Domains
2. Click 'Connect existing domain'
3. Enter your domain name
4. Follow DNS setup instructions
5. Wait 24-48 hours for propagation

üí° Can keep free .myshopify.com if not ready
tips: Existing domain: You'll need to edit DNS

steps.title: Install Essential Apps
steps.description: Add functionality with apps - many are free
steps.instructions:
1. Click 'Apps' in left sidebar
2. Click 'Customize your store'
3. Browse Shopify App Store
4. Recommended apps to install:
   - Email marketing (Klaviyo/Omnisend - free tier)
   - Reviews (Judge.me - free)
   - SEO optimizer (Plug in SEO - free)
   - Live chat (Tidio - free tier)
   - Analytics (Google Analytics - free)
5. Click 'Add app' for each
6. Follow setup wizard for each app

üí° Start with free apps, upgrade as you grow
tips: Many free apps have paid upgrades

spotlight.message: Install essential apps to extend your store's functionality

steps.title: Test Your Checkout
steps.description: Make sure customers can complete purchases successfully
steps.instructions:
1. Go to your store (click eye icon in Shopify admin)
2. Add a product to cart
3. Go to checkout
4. Use Shopify's test credit card:
   - Number: 1 (then any 15 digits)
   - Expiry: Any future date
   - CVV: Any 3 digits
5. Complete the test order
6. Check that:
   - Taxes calculate correctly
   - Shipping rates appear
   - Order confirmation email arrives
   - Order appears in Shopify admin
7. Cancel/refund the test order

‚úÖ Test on both desktop and mobile!
tips: Use incognito mode for realistic test
Check abandoned cart emails (if set up)

spotlight.message: Open your store in a new tab to test the checkout process

steps.title: Launch Your Store!
steps.description: Remove password protection and go live
steps.instructions:
1. Go to Online Store ‚Üí Preferences
2. Scroll to 'Password protection' section
3. Uncheck 'Enable password'
4. Click 'Save'
5. Your store is now live! üéâ

Next steps:
- Share on social media
- Start marketing (SEO, ads, social)
- Add more products
- Set up Google Analytics
- Create email marketing campaigns

üí° Keep improving based on customer feedback!

spotlight.message: Uncheck 'Enable password' to make your store public
